## ProductLinksInterface interface

ProductLinks contains information about linked products, including the link type and product type of each item.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ProductLinksInterface 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [link\_type?](./magento-api.productlinksinterface.link_type.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['String'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> One of related, associated, upsell, or crosssell. |
|  [linked\_product\_sku?](./magento-api.productlinksinterface.linked_product_sku.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['String'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> The SKU of the linked product. |
|  [linked\_product\_type?](./magento-api.productlinksinterface.linked_product_type.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['String'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> The type of linked product (simple, virtual, bundle, downloadable, grouped, configurable). |
|  [position?](./magento-api.productlinksinterface.position.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['Int'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> The position within the list of product links. |
|  [sku?](./magento-api.productlinksinterface.sku.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['String'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> The identifier of the linked product. |
